structure.unit: SERVICE OF PROCESS ON NONRESIDENT MOTORISTS

law.catch_line: Fee of Secretary of State -- Records.
law.text: The sheriff serving the summons upon the Secretary of State shall pay to him, at the time of service, a fee of ten dollars ($10), which shall be taxed as costs in the action. The Secretary shall keep a record of each summons, including the day and hour of service upon him.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 12-3.
